Integrated Learners
===================

```{r echo=FALSE,results='hide'}
library(xtable)

createPackageLink = function(p) {
  if (p %nin% "stats") 
    sprintf("`<a href = 'http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/%s/index.html'>%s</a>", p, p)
  else 
    p
}

createPackagesLinks = function(ps) {
  links = sapply(ps, createPackageLink)
  collapse(links, ", ")
}

convBool = function(x) {
  ifelse(x, "X", "")
}

printCell = function(s, align = "center") {
  catf("<td align=\"%s\">%s</td>", align, s)
}

printCellHeader = function(s, align = "center") {
  catf("<th align=\"%s\">%s</th>", align, s)
}

printHeader = function(header) {
  catf("<tr>")
  printCellHeader("Id", align = "left")
  printCellHeader("Name", align = "left")
  printCellHeader("Packages", align = "left")
  printCellHeader("prob / se ")
  printCellHeader("Numerics")
  printCellHeader("Factors")
  printCellHeader("NAs")
  catf("</tr>")
}
    
printLine = function() {
  catf("<tr><td colspan=6><hr></td></tr>")
}

printLearnersTab = function(type) {
  lrns = listLearners(type, create = TRUE)

  catf("<table cellpadding=5>")
  printHeader(colnames(d))
  old = list(type = "classif")
  for (x in lrns) {
    if (old$type != x$type)
      printLine()
    catf("<tr>")
    printCell(x$id, align = "left")
    printCell(x$name, align = "left")
    printCell(createPackagesLinks(x$package), align = "left")
    printCell(convBool(any(hasProperties(x, c("prob", "se")))))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "numerics")))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "factors")))
    printCell(convBool(hasProperties(x, "missings")))
    catf("</tr>")
    old = x
  }
  catf("</table>")
}
``` 

```{r echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
printLearnersTab(NA_character_)
```
